amendment.description: To require that, not later than March 31, 2007, the Secretary of the Army transport to an authorized disposal facility for appropriate disposal all of the Federal Government-furnished uranium in the chemical and physical form in which it is stored at the Sequoyah Fuels Corporation site in Gore, Oklahoma.

action.text: Amendment SA 4225 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4225 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
